message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.DB. 

The paper presents a method for reformulating the Recommender Systems problem in an Information Retrieval one, using algorithms such as LSPR and vector space model. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper deals with natural language processing (cs.CL) as it involves the use of terms and documents. The paper also involves data management and storage (cs.DB) as it deals with a dataset of users and movies. Finally, the paper may belong to the Cybersecurity (cs.CY) sub-category as it involves the prediction of ratings based on user behavior, which may have implications for security and privacy.
